summary: Marks the Riekling Spear as playable. Now you can use a spear too! Requires Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
Marks the Riekling Spear as playable. It's two-handed and uses the animations of a two-handed sword. You can find the spears on Rieklings throughout Solstheim or you can craft it at the forge.

[b]Requirements:[/b]
Dragonborn DLC

[b]Install:[/b]
Place PlayableRieklingSpear.esp in your Skyrim data folder and activate it in Data Files.


Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=194498690]Steam Workshop[/url].
author: knightspk2
